articles.author: Charlie Parker-Turner
articles.title: Transfer news LIVE as Man Utd eye Hojlund back-up and Chelsea given £13m boost - Express
articles.description: Express Sport brings you all the latest transfer news as the start of the 2023/24 Premier League season edges closer.
articles.content: With the 2023/24 Premier League campaign set to get underway in exactly a week, transfer plans are expected to be accelerated over the coming days. All of the Big Six are on the cusp of breakthroughs… [+1073 chars]
